biotools.summary: Affordable remote monitoring of plant growth in facilities using Raspberry Pi computers | A growth chamber sensing system using the Raspberry Pi as a platform | GMpi: A Growth Chamber Monitoring System Using the Raspberry Pi as a Platform | The GMpi is a cost-effective solution for monitoring the conditions of a growth chamber, greenhouse, or any other facility for which specific conditions (temperature, light, humidity, etc.) need to be maintained
